name: Tropical
description: Fruits that grow in warm climates and are rich in flavor.

name: Citrus
description: Fruits known for their tangy and refreshing taste, high in vitamin C.

name: Berry
description: Small, juicy fruits often eaten fresh or used in desserts.

name: Stone Fruit
description: Fruits with a central pit or stone, containing the seed.

name: Temperate
description: Fruits suited for moderate climates with a crisp and mild taste.

name: Exotic
description: Unique fruits with unusual flavors, typically not native to the area.

name: Melon
description: Large, sweet fruits with a juicy texture, often eaten in slices.

name: Drupe
description: Fruits with a hard stone or pit surrounded by fleshy fruit.
